personal_info.name: Jane Smith
personal_info.summary: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years developing scalable web applications and leading cross-functional teams. Passionate about clean code, user experience, and innovative technology solutions.

objective: Seeking a senior software engineering role where I can leverage my expertise in full-stack development and team leadership to drive impactful technology solutions.

work_experience.description: Lead development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ users daily. Mentor junior developers and collaborate with product teams on feature planning.
achievements: Reduced system latency by 40% through database optimization
Led migration to containerized deployment, improving deployment speed by 60%
Mentored 5 junior developers, with 3 receiving promotions

work_experience.description: Developed full-stack web applications using React and Node.js. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks.
achievements: Built user authentication system supporting OAuth and SSO
Implemented automated testing, increasing code coverage from 30% to 90%
Contributed to 300% user growth over 2 years

projects.name: E-Commerce Analytics Platform
projects.description: Built a real-time analytics dashboard for e-commerce businesses, processing 100K+ transactions daily with interactive visualizations.

projects.name: Open Source API Gateway
projects.description: Contributed to an open-source API gateway project used by 500+ companies worldwide. Added rate limiting and authentication features.
